key.name: show-always
key.description: Show the slider even when night light is disabled or off

key.name: show-status-icon
key.description: Show the night light indicator in the status area when night light is enabled

key.name: enable-always
key.description: Constantly update the night light schedule such that it is enabled throughout the day

key.name: minimum
key.description: Minimum slider value, lower is warmer

key.name: maximum
key.description: Maximum slider value, higher is cooler

key.name: brightness-sync
key.description: Adjust both brightness and night light warmth

key.name: show-in-submenu
key.description: Display the slider in the night light submenu instead of at the panel menu

key.name: swap-axis
key.description: Invert the slider axis such that lower is cooler and higher is warmer
